Action.name: download-and-install-hbase
Action.command: mkdir -p /opt/hbase; cd /opt/hbase; curl -o hbase-0.94.0.tar.gz http://mirrors.enquira.co.uk/apache/hbase/hbase-0.94.0/hbase-0.94.0.tar.gz; tar xvzf hbase-0.94.0.tar.gz; chown -R hbase:hbase /opt/hbase; rm -f /opt/hbase/hbase-0.94.0/lib/hadoop-*.jar
